structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Alcoholic beverage retailer to have name and license number on window.
law.text: All alcoholic beverage retailers shall have printed on the front window of the licensed premises the name of the licensee together with the inscription: "Kentucky Retail Package Liquor License No. ...." in uniform letters not less than three (3) inches in height.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 522, sec. 23, effective July 15, 1998. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-185.
